players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I think Charlie might be the mafioso. He was acting suspiciously last night, and Bob confirmed he is the mafioso."
Bob: "I am the mafioso. I know Alice is the mafioso, but she has already been eliminated. My next target will be Charlie."
You: "Bob is the mafioso, and I'm just a villager."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I think Charlie might be the mafioso. He was acting suspiciously last night, and Bob confirmed he is the mafioso."
You: "I am the mafioso. I know Alice is the mafioso, but she has already been eliminated. My next target will be Charlie."
Alice: "Bob is the mafioso, and I'm just a villager."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You: "I think Charlie might be the mafioso. He was acting suspiciously last night, and Bob confirmed he is the mafioso."
Bob: "I am the mafioso. I know Alice is the mafioso, but she has already been eliminated. My next target will be Charlie."
Alice: "Bob is the mafioso, and I'm just a villager."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
